Name: HOST_RST
Comment: Host Domain reset -active high, inverted in HW-

Name: PERIPH_RST
Comment: Periph Domain reset -active high, inverted in HW-

Name: SAFETY_ISLAND_RST
Comment: Safety Island reset -active high, inverted in HW-

Name: SECURITY_ISLAND_RST
Comment: Security Island reset -active high, inverted in HW-

Name: PULP_CLUSTER_RST
Comment: PULP Cluster reset -active high, inverted in HW-

Name: SPATZ_CLUSTER_RST
Comment: Spatz Cluster reset -active high, inverted in HW-

Name: L2_RST
Comment: L2 reset -active high, inverted in HW-

Name: L2_CLK_EN
Comment: Shared L2 memory clk gate enable

Name: PERIPH_CLK_SEL
Comment: Periph Domain pll select (0 -> host pll, 1 -> alt PLL, 2 -> per pll)

Name: SAFETY_ISLAND_CLK_SEL
Comment: Safety Island pll select (0 -> host pll, 1 -> alt PLL, 2 -> per pll)

Name: SECURITY_ISLAND_CLK_SEL
Comment: Security Island pll select (0 -> host pll, 1 -> alt PLL, 2 -> per pll)

Name: PULP_CLUSTER_CLK_SEL
Comment: PULP Cluster pll select (0 -> host pll, 1 -> alt PLL, 2 -> per pll)

Name: SPATZ_CLUSTER_CLK_SEL
Comment: Spatz Cluster pll select (0 -> host pll, 1 -> alt PLL, 2 -> per pll)

Name: L2_CLK_SEL
Comment: L2 Memory pll select (0 -> host pll, 1 -> alt PLL, 2 -> per pll)

Name: ETH_RGMII_PHY_CLK_DIV_EN
Comment: Ethernet RGMII PHY clock divider enable bit

Name: ETH_RGMII_PHY_CLK_DIV_VALUE
Comment: Ethernet RGMII PHY clock divider value

Name: ETH_MDIO_CLK_DIV_EN
Comment: Ethernet MDIO clock divider enable bit

Name: DRAM_AW_DELAY
Comment: Delay on AW channel towards DRAM

Name: DRAM_W_DELAY
Comment: Delay on W channel towards DRAM

Name: DRAM_B_DELAY
Comment: Delay on B channel towards DRAM

Name: DRAM_AR_DELAY
Comment: Delay on AR channel towards DRAM

Name: DRAM_R_DELAY
Comment: Delay on R channel towards DRAM
